name: Emperor's Power (V)
Lore: 'From his throne room aboard the second Death Star, Emperor Palpatine monitors activity throughout the galaxy.',
Text: 'Deploy on Emperor. Jedi are power -1 and deploy +1. During your control phase, if Emperor present at a battleground site with Vader (or two Imperial Council Members), opponent loses 1 Force.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
